branchCategory.name: C(D)J2-Z, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Stroke Options
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CJ2-Z with stroke options are great solutions for specialized applications. It is the standard stainless steel tube, air cylilnders are available in 6, 10 and 16mm bore sizes. Available in multiple mounting types for versatility.</p>
